about_the_game:
A bright, colorful palace for a Fairy Queen! With the Legendary Palace ~ Fairy tileset for RPG Maker, craft a dungeon full of butterfly wings and shining jewels.

The Legendary Palace ~ Fairy Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water in blue and purple
Four types of flooring (concrete, edged, marble and tiled) in dark gray, gold, pink and purple
Tables
Spike traps and holes

Walls:

Wall tiles to match floor tiles, plus bright “window” tiles in matching colorful frames.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
jeweled wall decor
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
Assorted decor and jewels
torches
Lots of separated elements so you can build your own decor items
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest with jeweled, lit and unlit versions
Various animated glowing jewels and tiles

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

A bright, colorful palace for a Fairy Queen! With the Legendary Palace ~ Fairy tileset for RPG Maker, craft a dungeon full of butterfly wings and shining jewels.

The Legendary Palace ~ Fairy Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water in blue and purple
Four types of flooring (concrete, edged, marble and tiled) in dark gray, gold, pink and purple
